title: Breaking the Cloud Barrier: AI Shift to Edge Computing
description: Artificial intelligence has long been tethered to high-performance data centers and cloud computing, reliant on the massive infrastructure needed to train and run deep learning models. But as AI embeds itself into everything from smart home devices to industrial automation, one thing is becoming clear: AI is moving away from the cloud—and onto devices themselves. […]

title: Bengaluru's AI Billboard Becomes 'Wall Of Shame' For Pending Traffic Challans
description: The Artificial Intelligence powered screen uses cameras to scan nearby vehicles and collects data from the VAHAN database to display it.
content: Bengaluru's Trinity Circle has become a center of attraction on the internet for India's first AI-powered billboard, which displays pending traffic fines. Based on reports, the initiative has been launched by Bengaluru Traffic Police in collaboration... [1846 chars]

title: GROK45T: A New Era of AI and Blockchain Synergy
description: In recent years, both artificial intelligence and blockchain have reshaped the way we think about technology. Each field alone has had enormous influence—AI driving automation, creativity, and decision-making, while blockchain redefined trust, ownership, and digital commerce. Yet when these forces merge, the possibilities expand dramatically. GROK45T represents this very convergence, stepping into the spotlight as […]

title: Elon Musk 'Thanks' Donald Trump As White House Approves Grok For Federal Use In 'Longest' xAI-GSA Deal
description: Trump administration has given the go-ahead for Elon Musk‘s artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot, Grok, to be used by all federal agencies. The approval comes with a unique offer from the General Services Administration (GSA).
content:

title: Data Meets Divine At Tirupati Temple: AI Command Centre To Control Crowds, Locate Missing Devotees
description: In a technological leap for temple management, the Andhra Pradesh government has unveiled an artificial intelligence (AI)-driven Integrated Command and Control Centre (ICCC) at the Sri Venkateswara temple in Tirumala. The system is designed to predict crowds, improve queue management and identify missing persons using facial recognition, as per reports.

title: AI boom fuels market mania as Jefferies flags warning signs
description: Artificial intelligence (AI) spending is driving one of the most aggressive bull runs in U.S. markets, but Jefferies has cautioned investors about growing signs of speculative excess even as gold and Chinese tech shares surge.

title: Elon Musk Accuses ChatGPT Owner OpenAI Of Stealing AI Secrets: ‘Deeply Troubling Pattern’
description: Elon Musk’s artificial intelligence startup xAI has filed a lawsuit against rival OpenAI in a California federal court, alleging ChatGPT maker stole trade secrets to secure an unfair advantage in the AI race. This marks the latest escalation in Musk’s ongoing legal conflict with his former business partner, Sam Altman.
